DOC.detailed_description: Stage A 1-day , single ascend dose study utilize 7 separate cohort unique subject ( healthy normal volunteer ) . Each cohort administer different dose AL-53817 Nasal Spray Solution order determine maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) . In Stage B , 2 different cohort unique , ragweed-sensitive subject administer MTD 5 day twice day determine safety efficacy AL-53817 Nasal Spray Solution treatment allergic rhinitis . Subjects require meet minimum allergic rhinitis score two qualify EEC visit participate study . Subjects continually house clinic 5-day treatment period .
